alert.note: Alert for Plymouth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 6:22PM CDT until May 08 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PLYMOUTH AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES... At 621 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Jefferson, or 8 miles northeast of Ponca, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...At 6:16 PM CDT Trained weather spotters reported 1 inch hail 1 mile SE of Elk Point, SD. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Jefferson around 625 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include North Sioux City and Sioux City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
